summary: A couple is accused of sodomy and pedophilia by two little girls. Soon they find their beloved sons taken away from them and themselves thrown in jail.
cast: Virginia Madsen|Jeffrey Nordling|Graham Beckel|Robert Joy|Barbara Tarbuck|Casey Biggs|John Billingsley|Adrian Sparks|Scott Paulin|Maree Cheatham|Ryan Wilson|Cody Dorkin|Dan Byrd|Scott Bailey|Gregory Smith|Deirdre O'Connell|Diana Castle|Kitty Swink|Tina Morasco|Marc Vann|Spencer Garrett|Karina Logue|John Mahon|Jack Shearer|Amanda Carlin|Daniel Nathan Spector|Dean Fortunato|Nick Sero|Antoinette Broderick|Elsie Escobar|David Allen Blackburn|Charlene Fernetz|Morocco Omari|Mieke ter Poorten|Christopher Michael|Kevin Beard|Armin Shimerman
title: Presunta inocencia
